Dialog.notes: SFX distort the voice. Almost demonic, telepathic at first.

Dialog.text: It's me. Alexei.
We can be together again. But you have to do what I say. It's very important.
Okay Papa?
There's something... something you have to do for me. For us. So we can be together. It's what you want.
Dialog.notes: The telepath is reading the volunteers mind, plucking things out and using them.

Dialog.text: Me. You. And... mama? Yes. Mama too.
Dialog.notes: Uncertain about the mama memory, then yes, certain.

Dialog.text: It's what you want.
Dialog.notes: Emphasis on want - voice slips into telepath SFX overlay.

Dialog.text: You have to find... my toy. You missed my birthday. Missed so many. I think about you and my toy all the time.
Remember. It's what you want.
Find my toy.
I won't force you.
Papa. I'm... sorry I told them about you. You're so far away now.
Papa. Why did you make a deal with those... men? Is it what you wanted? You wanted to be far away?
No. You wanted... you wanted us to... not perish.
No hurts. Stick together. Have fun. Remember, Papa?
You left us. All alone. With no toy. Hurry.
It's what you want.
Papa. I'm scared without my toy.
No, papa.
Stop. No hurting.
You're a bad bad bad-
Dialog.notes: Angry. Ends in the player's death.

Dialog.text: You found it. My toy. Take it to the space ships. The little ones. It's what you want.
You're so close. So close to me and mama. You have to put my toy in the space ship.
Papa? Why are you taking so long. Don't you want me to be happy?
Hurry papa. It's what you want.
Oh papa. I'm going to be so happy with my toy.
I'm so proud of you. So proud of you. So proud of-
Dialog.notes: SFX grow in creepy intensity until he player's head pops like a balloon.

Dialog.text: I'll show you where it is.
My friend will show you the way. Follow my friend, papa.
